channel.title: Mystic linking converted mystic outs them
channel.description:
I tried linking a mystic N2 couldn't. Then when I tried linking them N3 it worked meaning they were converted.
I think they should stay unlinkable because it's not fun when you instantly get outted

item.title: Mystic linking converted mystic outs them

item.description:
I think that’s the suggestion.

Read full topic
